'''"People of the Springs" Reputation EXP''' can be acquired by completing the [[People of the Springs]] [[Tribal Chronicles]], [[World Quest]]s and [[Exploration]] in the [[Toyac Springs]], and various [[Bounty|Bounties]] and [[Supply Notice]]s for the ''People of the Springs''.
